author: Louis Casiano
title: Pompeo calls for united 'message' after reportedly pushing G-7 users to call it 'Wuhan virus'
description: Foreign leaders from the Group of Seven (G-7) failed to agree on a joint declaration because of Secretary of State Mike Pompeo's insistence that they refer to the coronavirus as the "Wuhan virus," according to media reports.
content:
